msg: CLEREZZA-469:  using scala bundles rpovided by servicemix

author: adrianc
msg: Some bug fixes and improvements to ComponentContainer.java and Classpath.java:
1. <classpath type="dir" .../> did not add jar files to the classpath. That has been fixed.
2. <classpath type="dir" .../> that contained an invalid path was added to the classpath anyway. That has been fixed.
3. Added ability to load native libraries (*.dll, *.so).

author: reto
msg: CLEREZZA-465: renamed sourcebundle to bundledevtool to reflect its more generic nature
